thread.title: Weekend in mid-town NYC
thread.title_full: Weekend in mid-town NYC - Review of Park South Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travelz4culture
title: Weekend in mid-town NYC
text: Excellent property with great curb appeal and lobby area. Staff was very helpful. The Covina restaurant attached to the property was excellent. I highly recommend the cocktails and pizza. The valet parking was extremely convenient and very reasonably priced ($35). I checked other comparable hotels nearby and the parking fees at the other hotels was easily $20-30 more. Plus as a bonus there is a little bagel shop two doors down if you want a delicious breakfast for a few bucks.
